mapper.sql: m.parent_id parentId, m.update_user_id updateUserId, m.user_id userId, m.update_date updateDate, m.type, m.status, m.sort, m.menu_url menuUrl, m.menu_ico menuIco, m.menu_name menuName, m.create_date createDate, m.menu_code menuCode, m.id
mapper.select:
select
from sys_menu m left join sys_role_menu rm on m.id = rm.menu_id left join sys_user_role ur on rm.role_id = ur.role_id left join sys_role r on r.role_id = rm.role_id where ur.user_id = #{userId} and m.status = 0 and r.status = 0 order by m.sort asc

select m.parent_id, m.update_user_id, m.user_id, m.update_date, m.type, m.status, m.sort, m.menu_url, m.menu_ico, m.menu_name, m.create_date, m.menu_code, m.id, (select menu_name from sys_menu where id = m.parent_id) parentName, rm.role_id roleId from sys_menu m LEFT JOIN sys_role_menu rm ON rm.menu_id = m.id where m.status != 2 and m.id = #{menuId}
select m.id from sys_menu m left join sys_role_menu rm on m.id = rm.menu_id where rm.role_id = #{roleId} and status = 0 order by m.sort asc
